siteMetadata.title: Geoff wrote this
siteMetadata.subtitle: Things I wrote but probably aren't important. Usually somewhat programming related

markdownRemark.html:
I’ve been a software engineer since I was 12 when I copied the code from the Apple IIe manual. I’ve been hooked on code since.

You can find my professional career on LinkedIn and my code Github. I have an older Github Profile where you can find some of my older projects.

Unprofessionally, I have many hobbies ranging from gardening to camping and off roading with the kids.
